backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control state, multiple ordered maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, and activity tracking, plus related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting UI changes enabling anonymous access and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend source files and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and all route definitions for pages including tags and saved lilies.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks hook to add or remove a lily from saved items.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with navigation links and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, navigation, create menu, and avatar display, supporting mobile and desktop interactions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapping content with header, footer, and a mobile sidebar drawer that closes on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Left sidebar navigation with active-state highlights and recent activity list supporting lily previews.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post card with avatar, stats, like/share actions, and optional user or pond context.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a mobile slide-in left sidebar drawer with body scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderator info, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile pond header with banner, profile image, info, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a PostCard component.
Empty file placeholder for a RibbitEmojiTray component.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit reply item with avatar, likes, reply form, and nesting support.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with interactive selection.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Displays a dropdown under the search bar with trending terms or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags using reusable modules with loading states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger with underline-themed classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using localStorage with helpers to add, remove, toggle, and list bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, loading stored identities, login flow, and exposes identity/context helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with ponds, profiles, searches, and membership via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, base styling, and custom utility classes including search input, icon sizes, and hover effects.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into k/M/B shorthand with simple rounding.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and provides error messages for pond names restricted to alphanumeric characters.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Implements lily link sharing via Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric-only tags and returns user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity and settings in localStorage, including username generation, Froggy Phrase handling, and settings backup/restore.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per‑lily view count cooldowns in localStorage to limit increment frequency.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with loading states, join status, and a link to start a new pond.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including pond selection, tag suggestions, validation, and image preview handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form page for creating a pond with name validation, froggy phrase rules, and banner/profile image upload with previews.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for creating a post.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed displaying lilies sorted by trending or new, with search integration and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with details, ribbits, likes, view count logic, and image lightbox support.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a pond including moderators, visibility, images, and leave-pond functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed with lilies, handles joining ponds, and shows loading or not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an individual post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows bookmarked lilies using local storage and loads each lily or a fallback if missing.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting and canonical tag redirection.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Manages user settings including username changes, avatar upload, ponds, admin tools, and Froggy Phrase recovery.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and requirements for enabling full anonymous access, highlighting current authorization issues that block anonymous users. Lists existing features and new backend requests needed to remove user-role gating for actions like creating ponds, lilies, and saving avatars.
